ContextMappingConfig.name: ContextMappingConfig
ContextMappingConfig.description: Represents the context mapping configurations for business process types.

ContextDefinition.description: The context definition that's associated with the context mapping configuration.

ContextMapping.description: The context mapping that's associated with the context mapping configuration.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the claim context mapping is active (true) or not (false) in relation to the associated Context Mapping Configuration record.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type that's associated with the context mapping configuration.
